tree bce5f5720967c5ea1c86b91f8d0afd8bc5e48f35
parent 51ce4a2584f7356702f8e4faa1343e2ce47db5f8
author Oliver Schneider <git-spam-no-reply9815368754983@oli-obk.de> 1467798783 +0200
committer Oliver Schneider <git-spam-no-reply9815368754983@oli-obk.de> 1467798783 +0200

comparing floats is necessary in rare cases

files.patch:
@@ -75,8 +75,6 @@ pub fn binary_op<'tcx>(bin_op: mir::BinOp, left: PrimVal, right: PrimVal) -> Eva
                 Shl => unreachable!(),
                 Shr => unreachable!(),
 
-                // directly comparing floats is questionable
-                // miri could forbid it, or at least miri as rust const eval should forbid it
                 Eq => Bool($l == $r),
                 Ne => Bool($l != $r),
                 Lt => Bool($l < $r),
